page.title: 06HIGH SCHOOL? BISHOPBRIGGS P7
page.content: 1st and 2nd year pupils we met from Bishopbriggs High School said we would like secondary school because: {We}will not be stuck with the same teacher all day but have a variety. {There}are lots of out-of-school activities although there were very few this year because of industrial action by teachers. {Each}year the school puts on concerts and a musical in the summer term. {Physical}Education is very good with lots of opportunities to learn different games and athletics. {There}were 8 periods in the day so we would move around a lot. We might get lost at first because the building is so big but we would soon find our way. {Practical}subjects like Home Economics Metalwork, Art, etc. were enjoyable. {With}almost 800 pupils (about 150 in 1st Year)we could make lots of friends
